caption.title: Potential distributional changes for the subspecies Oncomelania hupensis hupensis and Oncomelania hupensis robertsoni.
caption.p: The fine-tuned Maxent (left side) and consensus models (right side) were calibrated on the accessible areas and transferred onto future climate in 2050–2060 (up) and 2080–2090 (bottom). White points indicate the surveillance sites, hatched areas indicate the administrative endemic areas.
